definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
see 和尚打傘，無法無天|和尚打伞，无法无天[he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1]
lit. like a monk holding an umbrella — no hair, no sky (idiom) (punning on 髮|发[fa4] vs 法[fa3])/fig. defying the law and the principles of heaven/lawless
pinyin: he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1

sentences.english: If it is an umbrella, memory is the most clear coagulation red umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 倘若是打伞，记忆最深的是清凝的红伞。

sentences.english: If a long time in the outdoors, summer, umbrella is the best approach.
sentences.chinese: 如果长时间在室外，夏季打伞是最好的办法。

sentences.english: What's it like to walk in the rain without an umbrella?
sentences.chinese: 不打伞在雨中行走是什么滋味？

sentences.english: When it rains, I don't like take umbrella.
He was wringing wet because he was caught in the rain without an umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 由于未打伞在雨中行走，他全身湿透了。

sentences.english: For us is inconceivable to use an umbrella without the rain.
sentences.chinese: 在意大利，很难想象不下雨我们会打伞。

sentences.english: Recently, some Internet users are discussing in a forum whether men should use a parasol as ladies do.
sentences.chinese: 近日，有网友在某论坛讨论男士该不该打伞。

sentences.english: Is it snowy not holding up an umbrella, you can live together?
sentences.chinese: 是没有是下亡雪没有打伞，即能一异黑尾？

sentences.english: Walk in a summer rain shower without an umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季阵雨中散步，不要打伞。

sentences.english: What is the best way to hold the umbrella to keep you as dry as possible?
sentences.chinese: 为了让你尽可能的干，怎样打伞是最好的？

sentences.english: When the maid of honor to the bride when why Huang heqing it?
sentences.chinese: 当伴娘把新娘接来的时候为什么一定要打伞呢？

sentences.english: She holds an umbrella for you on a rainy day.

definition: to get wet in the rain
to wear a hat/(fig.) to stigmatize/to be branded as
to take shelter from the rain
to blow cold/damping expectations by discouraging or realistic words
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
